title: Responsive Card With Image And Text

versions.prompt: Create a responsive card with image, title, and description
versions.code:
import React from 'react';
import type { Meta, StoryObj } from '@storybook/react';
import { Card, CardSection, Image, Text, Button, Badge, Group, Stack } from '@mantine/core';

const meta: Meta = {
  title: 'Generated/Responsive Card',
  parameters: { layout: 'centered' },
  tags: ['autodocs'],
};

export default meta;
type Story = StoryObj;

export const Default: Story = {
  render: () => (
    <Card shadow="sm" padding="lg" radius="md" withBorder style={{ maxWidth: 400 }}>
      <CardSection>
        <Image
          src="https://picsum.photos/400/250?random=1"
          alt="Card image"
          height={250}
        />
      </CardSection>

      <Group justify="space-between" mt="md" mb="xs">
        <Text fw={500}>Beautiful Landscape</Text>
        <Badge color="blue">Featured</Badge>
      </Group>

      <Text size="sm" c="dimmed">
        Discover amazing landscapes and breathtaking views from around the world. 
        Perfect for nature enthusiasts and adventure seekers.
      </Text>

      <Button color="blue" fullWidth mt="md" radius="md">
        Learn More
      </Button>
    </Card>
  ),
};

export const WithMultipleCards: Story = {
  render: () => (
    <Stack gap="md" style={{ maxWidth: 400 }}>
      <Card shadow="sm" padding="lg" radius="md" withBorder>
        <CardSection>
          <Image
            src="https://picsum.photos/400/200?random=2"
            alt="Mountain view"
            height={200}
          />
        </CardSection>
        <Text fw={500} mt="md">Mountain Adventure</Text>
        <Text size="sm" c="dimmed" mt="xs">
          Explore the highest peaks and enjoy stunning mountain views.
        </Text>
        <Button variant="light" color="blue" fullWidth mt="md">
          View Details
        </Button>
      </Card>

      <Card shadow="sm" padding="lg" radius="md" withBorder>
        <CardSection>
          <Image
            src="https://picsum.photos/400/200?random=3"
            alt="Ocean sunset"
            height={200}
          />
        </CardSection>
        <Text fw={500} mt="md">Ocean Paradise</Text>
        <Text size="sm" c="dimmed" mt="xs">
          Relax by the beach and watch beautiful sunsets over the ocean.
        </Text>
        <Button variant="light" color="blue" fullWidth mt="md">
          View Details
        </Button>
      </Card>
    </Stack>
  ),
};

export const WithBadges: Story = {
  render: () => (
    <Card shadow="md" padding="lg" radius="md" withBorder style={{ maxWidth: 400 }}>
      <CardSection>
        <Image
          src="https://picsum.photos/400/250?random=4"
          alt="Featured destination"
          height={250}
        />
      </CardSection>

      <Group justify="space-between" mt="md" mb="xs">
        <Text fw={700} size="lg">Premium Destination</Text>
        <Group gap="xs">
          <Badge color="green">New</Badge>
          <Badge color="pink">Popular</Badge>
        </Group>
      </Group>

      <Text size="sm" c="dimmed" mt="xs">
        Experience luxury travel at its finest. This exclusive destination offers 
        world-class amenities and unforgettable experiences for discerning travelers.
      </Text>

      <Group mt="md" gap="xs">
        <Button color="blue" fullWidth radius="md">
          Book Now
        </Button>
        <Button variant="outline" color="blue" fullWidth radius="md">
          Save for Later
        </Button>
      </Group>
    </Card>
  ),
};

Perfect for hiking enthusiasts and nature lovers seeking adventure in the great outdoors. ), }; export const WithBadge: Story = { render: () => ( Ocean Paradise Featured Experience pristine beaches and crystal-clear waters. An ideal destination for relaxation and water sports activities. ), }; export const MultipleCards: Story = { render: () => (

versions.prompt: Create a responsive card with image, title, and description
versions.code:
import React from 'react';
import type { Meta, StoryObj } from '@storybook/react';
import { Card, CardSection, Image, Text, Title, Button, Group } from '@mantine/core';

const meta: Meta = {
  title: 'Generated/Responsive Card',
  parameters: { layout: 'centered' },
  tags: ['autodocs'],
};

export default meta;
type Story = StoryObj;

export const Default: Story = {
  render: () => (
    <Card shadow="sm" padding="lg" radius="md" withBorder style={{ maxWidth: 400 }}>
      <CardSection>
        <Image
          src="https://picsum.photos/400/200?random=1"
          alt="Card image"
          height={200}
        />
      </CardSection>

      <Title order={3} style={{ marginTop: 16, marginBottom: 8 }}>
        Beautiful Landscape
      </Title>

      <Text size="sm" c="dimmed">
        Explore stunning natural landscapes and discover the beauty of nature. 
        This incredible destination offers breathtaking views and unforgettable experiences.
      </Text>

      <Group style={{ marginTop: 16 }}>
        <Button variant="filled" fullWidth>
          Learn More
        </Button>
      </Group>
    </Card>
  ),
};

export const WithMultipleActions: Story = {
  render: () => (
    <Card shadow="md" padding="lg" radius="md" withBorder style={{ maxWidth: 400 }}>
      <CardSection>
        <Image
          src="https://picsum.photos/400/200?random=2"
          alt="Product image"
          height={200}
        />
      </CardSection>

      <Title order={3} style={{ marginTop: 16, marginBottom: 8 }}>
        Premium Product
      </Title>

      <Text size="sm" c="dimmed" style={{ marginBottom: 16 }}>
        High-quality product crafted with attention to detail. Perfect for everyday use 
        and designed to last. Experience excellence with every purchase.
      </Text>

      <Group justify="space-between">
        <Button variant="outline">Add to Cart</Button>
        <Button variant="filled">Buy Now</Button>
      </Group>
    </Card>
  ),
};

export const Compact: Story = {
  render: () => (
    <Card shadow="sm" padding="md" radius="md" withBorder style={{ maxWidth: 350 }}>
      <CardSection>
        <Image
          src="https://picsum.photos/350/150?random=3"
          alt="Compact card image"
          height={150}
        />
      </CardSection>

      <Title order={4} style={{ marginTop: 12, marginBottom: 6 }}>
        Quick Overview
      </Title>

      <Text size="xs" c="dimmed" style={{ marginBottom: 12 }}>
        A brief description that captures the essence in just a few words.
      </Text>

      <Button variant="light" size="sm" fullWidth>
        View Details
      </Button>
    </Card>
  ),
};

versions.prompt: Create a responsive card with image, title, and description
versions.code:
import React from 'react';
import type { Meta, StoryObj } from '@storybook/react';
import { Card, CardSection, Image, Text, Title, Button, Group, Badge, Stack } from '@mantine/core';

const meta: Meta<typeof Card> = {
  title: 'Generated/Responsive Card with Image and Text (dc9d9f44)',
  component: Card,
  parameters: { layout: 'centered' },
  tags: ['autodocs'],
};

export default meta;
type Story = StoryObj<typeof meta>;

export const Default: Story = {
  render: () => (
    <Card shadow="sm" padding="lg" radius="md" withBorder style={{ maxWidth: 400 }}>
      <CardSection>
        <Image
          src="https://picsum.photos/400/250?random=1"
          height={250}
          alt="Card image"
        />
      </CardSection>

      <Stack gap="md" style={{ marginTop: '1rem' }}>
        <Title order={3}>Mountain Adventure</Title>
        <Text size="sm" c="dimmed">
          Explore breathtaking mountain landscapes and discover hidden trails. 
          Perfect for hiking enthusiasts and nature lovers seeking unforgettable experiences.
        </Text>
      </Stack>

      <Button fullWidth style={{ marginTop: '1rem' }}>
        Learn More
      </Button>
    </Card>
  ),
};

export const WithBadge: Story = {
  render: () => (
    <Card shadow="md" padding="lg" radius="md" withBorder style={{ maxWidth: 400 }}>
      <CardSection>
        <Image
          src="https://picsum.photos/400/250?random=2"
          height={250}
          alt="Featured destination"
        />
      </CardSection>

      <Group justify="space-between" style={{ marginTop: '1rem', marginBottom: '0.5rem' }}>
        <Title order={3}>Coastal Retreat</Title>
        <Badge color="blue" variant="filled">
          Featured
        </Badge>
      </Group>

      <Text size="sm" c="dimmed">
        Relax by the ocean and enjoy stunning sunsets. This coastal paradise 
        offers pristine beaches, crystal-clear waters, and luxurious accommodations 
        for an unforgettable getaway.
      </Text>

      <Group gap="sm" style={{ marginTop: '1rem' }}>
        <Button variant="filled" style={{ flex: 1 }}>
          Book Now
        </Button>
        <Button variant="outline" style={{ flex: 1 }}>
          View Details
        </Button>
      </Group>
    </Card>
  ),
};

export const Compact: Story = {
  render: () => (
    <Card shadow="sm" padding="md" radius="md" withBorder style={{ maxWidth: 350 }}>
      <CardSection>
        <Image
          src="https://picsum.photos/350/180?random=3"
          height={180}
          alt="City tour"
        />
      </CardSection>

      <Title order={4} style={{ marginTop: '0.75rem' }}>
        Urban Exploration
      </Title>
      <Text size="sm" c="dimmed" style={{ marginTop: '0.5rem' }}>
        Discover vibrant city life and iconic landmarks in this exciting urban adventure.
      </Text>

      <Button size="sm" fullWidth style={{ marginTop: '0.75rem' }}>
        Explore
      </Button>
    </Card>
  ),
};

versions.code:
import React from 'react';
import type { Meta, StoryObj } from '@storybook/react';
import { Card, CardSection, Image, Text, Title, Button, Stack, Group } from '@mantine/core';

const meta: Meta<typeof Card> = {
  title: 'Generated/Responsive Card with Image and Text (7c2075b5)',
  component: Card,
  parameters: { layout: 'centered' },
  tags: ['autodocs'],
};

export default meta;
type Story = StoryObj<typeof meta>;

export const Default: Story = {
  render: () => (
    <Card shadow="sm" padding="lg" radius="md" withBorder style={{ maxWidth: 400 }}>
      <CardSection>
        <Image
          src="https://picsum.photos/400/200?random=1"
          height={200}
          alt="Card image"
        />
      </CardSection>

      <Stack mt="md" mb="xs">
        <Title order={3}>Mountain Landscape</Title>
        <Text size="sm" c="dimmed">
          Explore the breathtaking beauty of mountain landscapes with stunning views and serene environments perfect for adventure seekers.
        </Text>
      </Stack>

      <Button fullWidth mt="md" radius="md">
        Learn More
      </Button>
    </Card>
  ),
};

export const WithBadge: Story = {
  render: () => (
    <Card shadow="md" padding="lg" radius="md" withBorder style={{ maxWidth: 400 }}>
      <CardSection>
        <Image
          src="https://picsum.photos/400/200?random=2"
          height={200}
          alt="Featured destination"
        />
      </CardSection>

      <Group justify="space-between" mt="md" mb="xs">
        <Title order={3}>Ocean Paradise</Title>
        <Text fw={700} c="blue">
          Featured
        </Text>
      </Group>

      <Text size="sm" c="dimmed" mb="md">
        Discover pristine beaches and crystal-clear waters in this tropical paradise. Perfect for relaxation and water sports enthusiasts.
      </Text>

      <Group>
        <Button variant="filled" fullWidth>
          Book Now
        </Button>
      </Group>
    </Card>
  ),
};

export const Compact: Story = {
  render: () => (
    <Card shadow="sm" padding="md" radius="md" withBorder style={{ maxWidth: 350 }}>
      <CardSection>
        <Image
          src="https://picsum.photos/350/150?random=3"
          height={150}
          alt="City skyline"
        />
      </CardSection>

      <Title order={4} mt="md">
        Urban Explorer
      </Title>
      <Text size="sm" c="dimmed" mt="xs">
        Experience vibrant city life with modern architecture and cultural attractions.
      </Text>
    </Card>
  ),
};
